TopicTitle: Revert Chase Camera behaviour to pre-1.0?

Articles.Content:
Is there a way to force the chase camera to lock position? Currently it makes docking rather a problem. I've coming in straight, then the camera acts all fancy "I'm going full blown Hollywood action shot" and spins all over the place, and I get disorientate. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-29T15:42:21Z" title="06/29/2015 03:42  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 29, 2015</time> by Technical Ben**

Switch to locked mode. 

You should have auto, orbit, free, chase, and locked.

I have noticed that locked tends to be somewhat.. upside down.
Thanks. Stupid me was toggling so fast did not see it.
